instruction: How do I track my order?
output: You can track your order by logging into your account and navigating to 'My Orders'. Click on the specific order you want to track, and you'll see real-time updates on its shipping status. You'll also receive tracking updates via email.

We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in their original condition with tags attached. To initiate a return, go to your order history, select the item, and click 'Return Item'. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email.

instruction: How can I change my shipping address?
output: If your order hasn't shipped yet, you can change the address in 'My Orders' by selecting the order and clicking 'Edit Shipping Address'. If it's already shipped, please contact our customer service team immediately at support@example.com, and we'll try to redirect the package.

instruction: My item arrived damaged, what should I do?
output: We apologize for the damaged item. Please take photos of the damage and the packaging, then go to your order history and select 'Report Problem'. Upload the photos and describe the issue. We'll either send a replacement or issue a full refund within 2-3 business days.

Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping is 2-3 business days, and overnight shipping delivers the next business day. Shipping times may vary during peak seasons or to remote locations.

Yes, you can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it if it hasn't shipped yet. Go to 'My Orders', select the order, and click 'Cancel Order'. If the order has already shipped, you'll need to wait for delivery and then initiate a return.

Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by destination, typically 7-21 business days. Additional customs fees and import duties may apply and are the responsibility of the recipient.

instruction: How do I apply a promo code?
output: During checkout, you'll see a field labeled 'Promo Code' or 'Discount Code'. Enter your code there and click 'Apply'. The discount will be reflected in your order total before you complete the purchase. Note that promo codes cannot be applied after an order is placed.

instruction: What payment methods do you accept?
output: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Amazon Pay. For orders over $500, we also accept bank transfers. All transactions are secured with SSL encryption.

instruction: How do I create an account?
output: Click on 'Sign Up' at the top right corner of our website. Enter your email address, create a password, and provide basic information. You'll receive a verification email - click the link to activate your account. With an account, you can track orders, save items, and checkout faster.

instruction: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
output: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. Click the link in the email and follow the instructions to create a new password. For security, the reset link expires after 24 hours.

instruction: How do I update my account information?
output: Log into your account and go to 'Account Settings'. From there, you can update your email, phone number, shipping addresses, and payment methods. Remember to save your changes before exiting.

instruction: Can I save items for later?
output: Yes! You can add items to your Wishlist by clicking the heart icon on any product page. You can also move items from your cart to 'Saved for Later' during checkout. All saved items are accessible from your account dashboard.

instruction: What if an item is out of stock?
output: If an item is out of stock, you can click 'Notify Me' on the product page to receive an email when it's back in stock. Alternatively, check the 'Similar Items' section for comparable products that are currently available.

instruction: How do I contact customer service?
output: You can reach our customer service team through: Live Chat (available 24/7 on our website), Email at support@example.com (response within 24 hours), or Phone at 1-800-XXX-XXXX (Mon-Fri 9AM-6PM EST). We're here to help!
